entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
